section.name: Metro Overview
section.p: Metro is component runtime solution. It handles that issues related to application deployment and the internal composition and management of components that make up an application. Metro does these things using some very strait-forward and simple concepts. Firstly and foremost Metro is an IOC Container (Inversion Of Control) but perhaps more interesting is the support within Metro for the notion of component driven Context Aware components backed by an Active, Model Driven, Part Based system arctitecture.
